question: Whenever I have gone in jamat I have heard that there are three positions for sitting while eating which are sunnah. Can you please give me the hadith substatiating this.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Abu Juhayfa (Radhiallaahu Anhu) narrates that Nabi (Sallallaahu Alayhi
Wasallam) said, 'I never eat while reclining.' He used to say, ' I am a
servant of Allah and sit and eat like a servant. He used to sit in a manner
that he was about to get up with the support of his knees.

The author of Mawhib says that while taking meals it is desirable to sit in
a manner that the knees are upward and the bottom of the feet touches the
ground or in a manner that only the right knee is kept upward and the left
knee touches the ground making a sitting posture. (Uswa-e-Rasul-e-Akram)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
